short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Connect to local Resources from Business Central (with Logico Engeneering and Project Solution)

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This App Enables Customers of Business Central with a Logico Engeneering and Project Solution to use local Resources directly from the Web Client.

This enables for example to directly open a Document (Word) and save back to Business Central without having to download and upload the document.
